vm.gui.questGui.title: Vanilla Magic Quests
vm.gui.vmTileEntityGui.title: VM TileEntity Details
vm.gui.vmTileEntityGui.name: Name:
spell.evoker.wololo.name: Wololo
spell.evoker.summonVex.name: Summon Vex
spell.evoker.fangs.name: Fangs
quest.desc.top: Inventory which will serve as input and output.
quest.desc.diamondBlock: Each Diamond Block in inventory will increase it's radius (8 blocks by default).
quest.craftOnAltar.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.spellFlintAndSteel.desc: Right-click on a block to put the block on fire.
quest.spellDragonFireball.desc: Right-click to shoot Ender Dragon's fireball.
quest.spellLargeFireball.desc: Right-click to shoot huge exploding fireball.
quest.spellTeleport.desc: Right-click to teleport where You are pointing at.
quest.jumper.desc: Shift-right-click block to save position. Right-click in air to teleport.
quest.spellTeleportToNether.desc: Right-click to teleport. (Pssst go higher... 60+ is safe... I think)
quest.spellTeleportToEnd.desc: Right-click to teleport. (You can't go back until You kill the Dragon)
quest.spellSummonMeteor.desc: Right-click to summon Meteor from the sky.
quest.spellPullEntityToPlayer.desc: Right-click while pointing at any entity to pull it to You.
quest.spellFreezeWater3x3.desc: Right-click to freeze the water in 3x3 radius.
quest.shootWitherSkull.desc: Right-click in air to shoot Wither Skull.
quest.mobSpawnerDropBlock.desc.usage: Right-click on Spawner to set it to the Entity from Book.
quest.buildAltarTier1.desc: Build a 3x3 circle and place a Cauldron in the middle.
quest.buildAltarTier2.desc: Add blocks and replace the Cauldron.
quest.buildAltarTier3.desc: Add blocks and replace the Cauldron.
quest.smeltOnAltar.desc: Toss smeltable items into Altar and right-click, also hold fuel (i.e. Coal).
quest.accelerant.desc: Speeds up ticks of nearby blocks. Shift-right-click the Cauldron.
quest.motherNatureCrystal.desc: Apply bonemeal to nearby blocks on each tick.
quest.quarry.desc.top: Input Inventory with fuel (i.e. Chest) or Energy Source
quest.farm.desc.smelting: Will consume any smeltable from input as fuel.
quest.killer.desc: Put any Sword into Killer's inventory. It will operate on area of 8x8 blocks.
quest.breeder.desc: Put any breeding item into inventory. It will operate on area of 8x8 blocks.
quest.arrowMachineGun.desc: Take any Arrow and Right-click (or hold).
quest.blockAbsorber.desc: Shift-right-click the Hopper. Hopper will absorb any block from above.
quest.buildAltarTier4.desc: Add blocks and replace the Cauldron.
quest.buildAltarTier5.desc: Add blocks and replace the Cauldron.
quest.questMoveBlock.desc: Shift-right-click on the Block to take / place it.
quest.captureEntity.desc: Shift-right-click on Entity to capture / release it.
quest.crystallizedLiquid.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.crystallizedLiquid.desc.ingredient: 1x Nether Star, 1x any Bucket with Fluid
quest.liquidSuppressionCrystal.desc: Liquid will vanish around You and after some time will appear.
quest.crystallizedPotion.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.crystallizedPotion.desc.usage: Hold it in inventory to get the effect of the Potion.
quest.accelerationCrystal.desc: Shift-right-click on block to speed it's ticks.
quest.buildAltarTier6.desc: Add blocks and replace the Cauldron.
quest.inventoryBridge.desc: Transfer items from source position to output position.
quest.inventoryBridge.desc.save: Right-click on Input Inventory Block (i.e. Chest) to save position.
quest.inventoryBridge.desc.create: Right-click on Output Inventory Block (i.e. Chest) to create bridge.
quest.inventoryBridge.desc.clear: Right-click in air to clear saved position.
quest.buildAltarTier7.desc: Add blocks and replace the Cauldron.
quest.oreMultiplier.desc: Place Cauldron. On each side place Furnace.
quest.oreMultiplier.desc.crafting: Drop ores into Cauldron and Right-click it. Hold fuel in left hand.
quest.itemMagnet.desc: Hold 2 Nether Stars anywhere in Your inventory but as different stacks.
quest.itemTierUpgrade.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.itemUpgrades.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
